About the Package ================================ The cluster management and orchestration features embedded in the Docker Engine are built using swarmkit. Swarmkit is a separate project which implements Docker's orchestration layer and is used directly within Docker. A swarm consists of multiple Docker hosts which run in swarm mode and act as managers (to manage membership and delegation) and workers (which run swarm services). Can be used for: . Clustering and scheduling tool for Docker containers. . IT administrators and developers can establish and manage a cluster of Docker nodes as a single virtual system. . Allows managing of Docker Cluster remotely.
=Supported versions= 1.12 and above
=Setup= * The Agent should be able to access docker Server. * For remote access docker client should be present on agent OS and Path to docker.exe should be set in PATH environment Variable..
=Variables= none
=Common Inputs= -Host: Specify the address or hostname of the docker server E.g. 192.168.41.155 -Port: SSpecify the port of the docker server. E.g. 2377 -CA Certificate: The path to trust certs signed only by this CA. E.g. /home/automic/.docker/ca.pem -TLS Certificate: The path to trust TLS certificate signed only by this CA. E.g. /home/automic/.docker/cert.pem -TLS KEY: The path to trust key signed only by this CA. E.g. /home/automic/.docker/key.pem -Skip TLS Verification: If Yes, the server's certificate will not be checked for validity. E.g. Yes, No
=Actions= Following actions are supported.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_SERVICE * Action Description: This action is used to create a service.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_SERVICE * Action Description: This action is used to remove one or more services.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.ACTION.SCALE_SERVICE * Action Description: This action is used to Scale service.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.ACTION.UPDATE_SERVICE * Action Description: This action is used to Update the service.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.ACTION.LIST_SERVICES * Action Description: This action is used to list services running on swarm.
